alert.note: Alert for Eastern Cochise County Below 5000 Feet including Douglas, Willcox; Upper Gila River and Aravaipa Valleys including Clifton, Safford (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued February 14 at 3:46AM MST until February 15 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Tucson
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM NOON TODAY TO 5 AM MST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Southwest winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts around 55 mph expected. Areas of blowing dust wind reduced visibilities. * WHERE...Eastern Cochise County below 5000 feet and Upper Gila River Valley. * WHEN...Strongest wind speeds during the effective period of the advisory will be tonight. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. Cross winds with reduced visibilities in blowing dust making travel difficult at times, especially along Interstate 10.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Cochise County Below 5000 Feet including Douglas, Willcox; Upper Gila River and Aravaipa Valleys including Clifton, Safford
